document.full_text: the clock showed 7:14 when dwyane wade hit a 3 that pushed miami's lead to 15 points. after lebron james and wade danced, the mavericks went on a 22-5 run.
document.title: an early celebration leaves the heat with a game 2 hangover
lines_and_colors: the clock showed 7:14 when dwyane wade hit a 3 that pushed miami's lead to 15 points. after lebron james and wade danced, the mavericks went on a 22-5 run.
